translation.en: -I got a sugar cube. -I got a biscuit crumb.
translation.zh:
‎-我偷了一颗方糖
‎-我的是饼干屑

translation.en: On the next sneak, can we break into the house with the…
translation.zh:
‎我们下次能不能去那种房子里偷
‎就是里面有…
‎长得真好笑 可以吃了它吗？

translation.en: Well, it's a robin, I think.
After all, she's only one little…
translation.zh: ‎毕竟 她只是一只小小的…

translation.en: We're on our way to break into a house
Might be a bird But I sneak just like a mouse
translation.zh: ‎虽是只小鸟 但我偷术如老鼠

translation.en: -So, what are you getting tonight? -I might get a pie crumb?
translation.zh:
‎-那么 你们今晚想偷什么呢？
‎-我也许偷块馅饼屑？

translation.en: -Something moldy, I think. -Well, I'm gonna sneak a whole crust.
translation.zh:
‎-我想弄点发霉的东西
‎-我要去偷一块完整的酥皮

translation.en: Well, I'm going to sneak a whole sandwich. Yes.
translation.zh: ‎我要去偷一整个三明治 就这样

translation.en: -You can't sneak a whole sandwich. -How do you sneak a sandwich?
translation.zh:
‎-你不能偷一整个三明治
‎-你要怎么偷到一整个三明治？

‎-皮普 你打头阵
‎-好的 爸爸

‎-弗林 芙琳 别太招摇
‎-好

translation.en: The rules of the sneak are simple and thus
translation.zh: ‎潜行的规则很简单 因此

translation.en: Follow them close You could steal a crust
translation.zh: ‎只要按部就班 就能得到酥皮

translation.en: -Or a crumpet rind -Or a pinch of pie
translation.zh:
‎-或一块松饼皮
‎-或一小块馅饼

translation.en: Or the grease from the tip Of a soggy french fry
Crumbs and crusts and stale bread
Any old leftovers We'll sneak home with us
translation.zh: ‎任何残渣和剩菜 我们都会偷回家

translation.en: First find a secret entrance Keep your eyes open wide
translation.zh:
‎首先找到隐蔽的入口
‎瞪大眼睛 要警惕

translation.en: -Or a window with a gap -Just enough to squeeze inside
translation.zh:
‎-或是窗户缝
‎-只要足够挤进去

translation.en: Once we're in, we creep around Tiptoe past without a sound
translation.zh: ‎进去以后 四处逛 蹑手蹑脚 无声息

translation.en: Keep to the shadows Don't get heard
Last, the most important Remember in the who-man place
translation.zh: ‎最后 也是最重要的 记住轮类地盘上

translation.en: So we must never leave a trace
Crumbs and crusts and stale bread Soggy flakes and bin dregs
translation.zh:
‎脆屑 酥皮和陈面包
‎浸湿的麦片和罐头渣

translation.en: Any old leftovers We'll sneak home with us
translation.zh: ‎任何残渣和剩菜 我们都会偷回家

translation.en: When we're done, we disappear Nobody knows that we were here
translation.zh: ‎拿完东西就消失 无人知是我们来

translation.en: -With crumbs in our hands -And warmth in our hearts
And the sludge from the tin Of a moldy jam tart
translation.zh: ‎还有发霉果酱塔上的甜果泥

translation.en: Keep to the shadows Take what we need
The rules of the sneak are these
Well, let's not go back there again.
They'll be setting out traps or maybe even getting a kitten.
translation.zh: ‎他们肯定会布下陷阱 甚至养只小猫

translation.en: Well, the spoon, and the sandwich, and--
translation.zh: ‎那个勺子 还有三明治 还有…

translation.en: Come on. We've still got plenty to eat.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我们还有很多吃的

translation.en: There's the bag of Earl Grey.
All right. Well, come on now. Off to bed.
It's okay, Robin. We'll figure this out together.
translation.zh: ‎没关系的 罗宾 我们会想到办法的

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, next time, I'll just…

translation.zh: ‎”嗨 罗宾 这些都是什么呀？“

translation.en: "Yeah. It was easy. Just got them from a who-man house."
translation.zh:
‎”对 小菜一碟
‎就是从一个轮类家拿回来的“

translation.en: "Oh, wow, Robin! You're the most amazing sneak ever!"
translation.zh: ‎“罗宾！你是有史以来最棒的小偷！”

translation.en: Can't wait to see the look on Pip's face
translation.zh: ‎等不及想看看 皮普看到我

translation.en: when I come back with a crumb the size of his head.
translation.zh:
‎带回一块
‎有他脑袋那么大的脆屑时的表情了

‎-请问你知不知道哪里…
‎-不知道！

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't realize this was a…
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我没注意到这里是…

translation.en: -Well, I've got a broken wing! -Oh no. How did that happen?
translation.zh:
‎-我翅膀受伤了！
‎-不是吧 怎么受伤的？

translation.en: -Let's get you safe indoors, hey? -Thanks. Is the cat still--
translation.zh:
‎-快进屋躲躲吧 好吗？
‎-谢谢 那只猫是不是还在…

translation.en: -Are we safe in here? -Yes. We're safe.
translation.zh:
‎-在这里安全吗？
‎-是的 我们很安全

translation.en: The thorns keep unwanted visitors out.
translation.zh: ‎尖刺会把不速之客挡在外面

translation.en: Why, thank you. I suppose it is rather…
Bet they've got loads of crumbs in there.
translation.zh: ‎我猜里面肯定有超多的脆屑

translation.en: And all because of that magic shiny wishing star, eh?
translation.zh:
‎而这都是多亏了那颗
‎闪闪发光的神奇许愿星 对吧？
‎慢着 不好意思 什么？

translation.en: Okay. It must be here somewhere.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 应该就在这儿的某个角落

translation.en: Once a year, the who-mans take the spikiest tree in the woods,
translation.zh:
‎每一年 轮类都会带走
‎树林里最尖的树

translation.en: cover it in tin-soil and boo-bells,
translation.zh: ‎用光篇和一些砖饰球打扮它

translation.en: until their tree is all twinkling and beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎让整棵树变得光彩熠熠 美轮美奂

translation.en: Then, they put a shiny magic star on top, make a wish,
translation.zh:
‎接着 他们会把一颗闪闪发光的
‎神奇小星星放在树顶 ‎许下愿望 第二天早上
‎就会得到任何他们想要得到的东西

translation.en: and in the morning, they get anything they want.
translation.zh:
‎许下愿望 第二天早上
‎就会得到任何他们想要得到的东西

translation.en: Well, what could be better than crumbs?
Things will stick with you till the end Oh yes, on things you can depend
translation.zh:
‎物件 会伴你终老
‎没错 物件 值得你信赖

translation.en: Simply must have the latest bottle top I love it so, I'll never stop
translation.zh:
‎居家必备的最新瓶盖
‎我的挚爱 此生不渝

translation.en: This is a limited-edition piece of string
I was a bird who couldn't fly Felt tiny while they flew up high
translation.zh:
‎我是一只不会飞的鸟
‎看别人飞翔 总自觉渺小

translation.en: Surrounded myself with things so gorgeous
Things turn a hovel to a home
Got no personality? I let my lampshade speak for me
translation.zh: ‎没有个性？让我的台灯展风采

translation.en: Hollow inside? You're not enough? Just stuff that hole with lovely stuff
translation.zh: ‎里面太空？不满足？塞些可爱小物件

translation.en: Things are things that make you happy Who needs friends? I've got a shoe chair
translation.zh:
‎物件让你乐开怀
‎谁需要朋友？我有只鞋椅

translation.en: No one there for you to care for? Polish up your silverware for?
translation.zh:
‎没人让你牵肠挂肚？
‎银器擦亮无人赏？

translation.en: There's no better company than one penny
Look, my point is, wish for something far better than crumbs.
translation.zh:
‎我主要是想说
‎期盼点远比脆屑更好的东西吧

translation.en: Impossible! It's inside the who-man house.
translation.zh: ‎不可能！它在轮类的房子里面

translation.en: Maybe I forgot to mention? I was raised by mice.
translation.zh:
‎我可能忘了跟你说？
‎我是被老鼠养大的

translation.en: And if there's one thing us mice are good at, it's sneaking.
translation.zh:
‎要说我们老鼠有什么特长
‎非潜行莫属

translation.en: To get stuff. Like, stealing it.
translation.zh: ‎拿点什么东西 或者说是 偷

translation.en: What are you doing? You're supposed to wait outside.
translation.zh: ‎你进来做什么？ ‎你应该在外面等的

translation.en: We're going to have to be the sneakiest mice we've ever been.
translation.zh:
‎看来 我们注定要成为
‎有史以来的最佳偷窃鼠了

translation.en: Just do exactly what I do.
What are you doing? You'll wake the who-mans.
translation.zh: ‎你在干什么？你会把轮类吵醒的！

translation.en: The whole point of being a mouse
translation.zh: ‎作为老鼠 最重要的一点

translation.en: is that you don't draw attention to yourself.
Not bad for a couple of flightless fools, eh?
translation.zh:
‎作为两只不会飞的傻鸟
‎这身手还不错吧？

translation.en: Why is it you don't fly?
I just never learned. I mean, mice don't fly.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没学过 老鼠又不会飞

translation.en: Well, it's easy! You just flap!
it's the little bird who sneaks about on the floor like a…
translation.zh: ‎这只小鸟要在地面东躲西藏 就像只…

translation.en: And who are you trying to fool with those… funny things?
translation.zh:
‎你头上那对奇怪的东西
‎是用来唬谁的？

‎-我的家人都是老鼠 所以…
‎-老鼠？

translation.en: You know you'll never be a real mouse.
translation.zh: ‎但却永远不可能成为真正的老鼠

translation.en: Micey ears atop a birdy beak
But I've never seen a bird So peculiar, so absurd
translation.zh: ‎从未见过有小鸟 如此怪异 如此荒诞

translation.en: How about we play a game Of hide-and-seek, if you can?
translation.zh:
‎要不要和我玩个游戏
‎躲猫猫 你会吗？

translation.en: As a mouse, to me You seem to be just terrible
translation.zh: ‎身为老鼠 我觉得你面目可憎

translation.en: Fitting in is more Than dress-up and pretend
translation.zh: ‎要融入 不止需要服装与伪装

translation.en: If it's fitting in you're desperate for Come down, search no more
translation.zh:
‎若你心向往之 融入他们
‎快下来 别找了

translation.en: I know the perfect place For you, my friend
translation.zh: ‎我知道有个最适合你的地方 朋友

translation.en: For you, I've the perfect place
Not picky, stick with me What's in a name?
translation.zh: ‎别挑剔 跟我来 该怎么叫你？

translation.en: After all, under the skin You're all the same
translation.zh: ‎反正 皮毛之下 你们都一样

translation.en: Fitting in could be a breeze
Just a squash and a squeeze
Brush out those ears Come along with me
Quick as a glug You could be sitting snug, perfectly
translation.zh: ‎咕噜一声 很快的‎ ‎你会坐得很舒服

translation.en: You don't fit in But you'd fit into my belly
translation.zh: ‎你不能融入他们 但可以融进我胃里

translation.en: For you, I've the perfect place
For you, I've the perfect place
You really are a terrible mouse
We did it! Everlasting happiness awaits!
translation.zh: ‎我们成功了！恒久的幸福就在眼前！

translation.en: Told you us mice are good at sneaking.
translation.zh: ‎就跟你说我们老鼠很擅长偷东西吧

translation.en: You know, I think we make very bad mice. Yes. Quite terrible.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我们是非常不合格的老鼠
‎真的 简直糟糕透了

translation.en: But who cares? We got the star!
translation.zh: ‎但谁在乎呢？我们拿到小星星了！

translation.en: Well, I hope you thought of something better to wish for
translation.zh:
‎但愿你已经想到
‎要许个比湿软的陈三明治

translation.en: You know, like a hubcap. Or a shiny fork. Or a pincil sharpener.
translation.zh:
‎你知道的 比如一个车轮盖
‎或者闪亮的餐叉 或者是切笔刀

translation.en: Or a thimble. Or how about a safety pin…
translation.zh: ‎又或是顶针 或者安全别针如何…

translation.en: Well, I wish I wasn't a bird.
I wish I was a mouse.
Come now. It was always a bit of a long shot, eh?
translation.zh:
‎振作点 许愿这种事
‎本来成功几率就不大 对吧？

translation.en: We've been looking everywhere for you!
I went to sneak us some crumbs, but… it all went wrong.
translation.zh:
‎我想出来给大家偷点脆屑
‎但出了点意外

translation.en: I think I'm a… terrible mouse.
I couldn't have said it better myself.
translation.zh: ‎真是喜从天降 出乎意料

translation.en: Don't worry. There's no way she could fit through the…
translation.zh: ‎别担心 她不可能钻得进…

translation.en: The rules of the sneak are these

translation.zh: ‎你是我们见过最不贼眉鼠眼…

translation.en: But, of course, you're a mouse.
translation.zh: ‎但毋庸置疑 你就是一只老鼠

translation.en: -Sorry, is that confusing? -Yeah, what? She's a bird.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 我说得是不是有点绕？
‎-是 什么意思？她是只鸟

translation.en: Exactly. She is a bird, and that's wonderful.
translation.zh: ‎没错 她是只鸟 这非常棒

translation.en: And what I mean is, we're the mouse family. All of us.
translation.zh:
‎但我的意思是
‎我们大家都是老鼠家族的一员

translation.en: -Is the cat one of the family? -No, Dink. The cat tried to eat us.
translation.zh:
‎-那只猫也是我们家的一员吗？
‎-不是 丁科 那只猫想吃了我们

translation.en: -Because she loves us? -No. Because she's a predator.
translation.zh:
‎-因为她爱我们？
‎-不 因为她是捕猎者

translation.en: -So, you fly now? -Well, yeah. I guess so.
translation.zh:
‎-所以 你现在会飞了？
‎-是吧 我猜是这样

translation.en: But we're all still hungry, and you've ruined Magpie's house.
translation.zh:
‎可我们依然在饿肚子
‎而且你还毁了麦格派的房子
‎没关系的 它们不过是些物件

translation.en: Yeah, and I'm bad at sneaking.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 而且我也不擅长偷东西

translation.en: If anything, I just draw attention to myself.
translation.zh: ‎如果有状况发生 我会负责吸引注意

translation.en: Hey! Over here! A song for your ear
While we keep to the shadows
Don't get heard Whisper every single word
translation.zh: ‎不出声 窃窃私语 很小心

translation.en: Look at me fly Catching your eye
-With crumbs in our arms -And a raisin or two
translation.zh:
‎-我们手拿脆屑
‎-加一两颗葡萄

translation.en: And a coin from the middle Of this sticky brown poo
translation.zh: ‎还有枚从这棕便便里拿出来的小硬币

translation.en: Look at me And you won't see my sneaky family
translation.zh: ‎看着我 你就不会看见我的小偷家人

translation.en: -Don't make a sound -Do make a sound
-Don't leave a trace -Do leave a trace
-Keep to the shadows -And to the light
-Take what we need -This is more than we need.
The rules of the sneak are these
